import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { fetchInvited } from '../actions/invitedAction'; import { fetchSendInvited } from '../actions/sendInviteAction'; import {Field, reduxForm} from 'redux-form'; import $ from 'jquery'; import setSelect2 from "../assets/js/setSelect2"; class AdicionarConvidado extends Component { componentDidMount(){ this.props.fetchInvited(this.props.match.params.id); setSelect2(); } sendInvite() { let inputs = document.querySelectorAll('form[name="dado-convidado"] input'); inputs = Array.from(inputs); let arrayInputs = inputs.every((item) => { return $(item).val() !== ''; }); if(arrayInputs) { let objSendInvite = {}; objSendInvite.name = $('[name="nome_convidado"]').val(); objSendInvite.email = $('[name="email_convidado"]').val(); objSendInvite.telephone = $('[name="telefone_convidado"]').val(); objSendInvite.telephone_ddd = "21"; objSendInvite.escort_adult = parseInt($('[name="adultos_convidado"]').val()); objSendInvite.escort_child = parseInt($('[name="criancas_convidado"]').val()); objSendInvite.group_id = parseInt($('[name="grupo_convidado"]').val()); objSendInvite.send_email = true; this.props.fetchSendInvited( this.props.match.params.id, objSendInvite ); } } render() { console.log(this.props); const { invited } = this.props; return(

) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ invited: state.invited, sendInvite: state.sendInvite }) const reduxSendInvite = reduxForm({form: 'sendInvite'})(AdicionarConvidado); export default connect(mapStateToProps, {fetchInvited, fetchSendInvited})(reduxSendInvite);
